alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, northeastern Gadsden, Jefferson, Leon, Decatur, Grady, southern Mitchell and Thomas Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of West Bainbridge to near Whigham to near Florida A and M to 12 miles south of Crawfordville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Thomasville, Havana, Pelham, St. Marks, Bainbridge, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Cairo, Camilla, Ochlocknee, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, West Bainbridge and Wakulla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Inland Wakulla; Leon
